alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 4:32AM CDT until June 15 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CDT FOR EASTERN DALE AND CENTRAL HENRY COUNTIES... At 432 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Fort Gaines to near Headland to Midland City, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Headland, Ozark, Midland City, Newton, Pinckard, Newville, Napier Field, Shorterville, Bells Crossroads, Hunt Field, Waterford, Tumbleton, Kirkland Crossroads, Mabson, Snells Crossroads, Ewell, Graball, Headland Municipal A/P and Dancey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
